flawed_nl_solution:
After Smith gave him $200, Randy had 3000+200=<<3000+200=3220>>3220 dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is 3220-1200=<<3220-1200=2020>>2020 dollars.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3200, not 3220. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
